messages.subject: Re: Moms doing what they want
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/1/2003 9:43:17 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Sigh....Mary...the point isn t that you need to have any interests than nobody else
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/1/2003 9:43:17 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> I can't really think of any interest I have, in a
> house of 7, that someone else doesn't enjoy along with me. From my love of
> medical information to my love of nature. Someone else here is interested
> also. So in all reality, I guess I don't have any interests of my own!
>

Sigh....Mary...the point isn't that you need to have any interests than
nobody else has....It's that you have to have your Own interests. Did you
really think that we believed it didn't count if anyone else shared your
interest?
Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
